asteroids.model

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • asteroids.model.Entity
      • asteroids.model.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends Entity
    A class of ships involving a position, velocity, radius and orientation.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Simon Merckx and Tobias Cornille. We both study informatics (1ba). Private repo on https://github.com/tobiascornille/Asteroids Please send us an email with your account info so we can add you as a contributer.
    Invariants:
  • The orientation of each ship must be a valid orientation for any ship.
         isValidOrientation(getOrientation())
  • Each ship must have proper bullets.
        hasProperBullets()
  • The mass of each ship must be a valid mass for any ship.
        isValidMass(getMass())
  • The density of each ship must be a valid density for any ship.
        isValidDensity(getDensity())
  • The total mass of each ship must be a valid total mass for that ship.
        isValidTotalMass(getTotalMass())

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ship()
      Initialize this new ship as a non terminated ship with no bullets yet.
      Ship(Vector position, Vector velocity, double radius, double orientation, double mass)
      Initialize this new ship as a non terminated ship with given X coordinate of the position, given Y coordinate of the position, given X component of the velocity, given Y component of the velocity and given orientation, and with no bullets yet.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ship

        public Ship()
        Initialize this new ship as a non terminated ship with no bullets yet.

      • Ship

        public Ship(Vector position,
            Vector velocity,
            double radius,
            double orientation,
            double mass)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initialize this new ship as a non terminated ship with given X coordinate of the position, given Y coordinate of the position, given X component of the velocity, given Y component of the velocity and given orientation, and with no bullets yet.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of this new ship.
        velocity - The velocity of this new ship.
        radius - The radius of this new ship.
        orientation - The orientation of this new ship.
        Precondition:
        The given orientation must be a valid orientation for any ship.
             isValidOrientation(orientation)
        Postcondition:
        This new ship has no bullets yet.
             new.getNbBullets() == 0
        Effects:
      • The position of this new ship is set to the given position.
             this.setPosition(position)
      • The velocity of this new ship is set to the given velocity.
            this.setVelocity(velocity)
      • The orientation of this new ship is set to the given orientation.
            this.setOrientation(orientation)
        • Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • Method Detail

      • getOrientation

        @Basic
 @Raw
public double getOrientation()
        Return the orientation of this ship.
        Returns:
        Returns the orientation of this ship.
             result == this.orientation

      • turn

        public void turn(double angle)
        Turn the ship by adding a given angle to the current orientation.
        Parameters:
        angle - The given angle.
        Precondition:
        The given angle plus the current orientation has to be valid.
            isValidOrientation(this.getOrientation() + angle)
        Postcondition:
        The new orientation of the ship is the old orientation plus the angle.
            new.getOrientation() == this.getOrientation() + angle;

        public boolean isValidTotalMass(double totalMass)
        Check whether the given total mass is a valid total mass for this ship.
        Parameters:
        totalMass - The total mass to check.
        Returns:

            result >= this.getMass()

      • setTotalMass

        @Raw
public void setTotalMass(double totalMass)
        Set the total mass of this ship to the given total mass.
        Parameters:
        totalMass - The new total mass for this ship.
        Postcondition:
        If the given total mass is a valid total mass for any ship, the total mass of this new ship is equal to the given total mass.
            if (isValidTotalMass(totalMass))
              then new.getTotalMass() == totalMass

        public boolean canHaveAsRadius(double radius)
        Check whether this ship can have the given radius as its radius.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius to check.
        Returns:
        True if the radius is larger than 10.
             result == (radius > 10)

      • canHaveAsBullet

        @Raw
public boolean canHaveAsBullet(Bullet bullet)
        Check whether this ship can have the given bullet as one of its bullets.
        Parameters:
        bullet - The bullet to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given bullet is effective and that bullet is a valid bullet for a ship.
            result ==
              (bullet != null) &&
              Bullet.isValidShip(this)

      • hasProperBullets

        public boolean hasProperBullets()
        Check whether this ship has proper bullets attached to it.
        Returns:
        True if and only if this ship can have each of the bullets attached to it as one of its bullets, and if each of these bullets references this ship as the ship to which they are attached.
            for each bullet in Bullet:
              if (hasAsBullet(bullet))
                then canHaveAsBullet(bullet) &&
                     (bullet.getShip() == this)

      • getNbBullets

        public int getNbBullets()
        Return the number of bullets associated with this ship.
        Returns:
        The total number of bullets collected in this ship.
            result ==
              card({bullet:Bullet | hasAsBullet({bullet)})

      • removeBullet

        @Raw
public void removeBullet(Bullet bullet)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Remove the given bullet from the set of bullets of this ship.
        Parameters:
        bullet - The bullet to be removed.
        Postcondition:
        This ship no longer has the given bullet as one of its bullets.
            ! new.hasAsBullet(bullet)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - | ! this.hasAsBullet(bullet)
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - | bullet.getShip() != this

        @Raw
public void setDensity(double density)
        Set the density of this ship to the given density.
        Parameters:
        density - The new density for this ship.
        Postcondition:
        If the given density is a valid density for any ship, the density of this new ship is equal to the given density.
            if (isValidDensity(density))
              then new.getDensity() == density

 @Raw

      • isValidDensity

        public static boolean isValidDensity(double density)
        Check whether the given density is a valid density for any ship.
        Parameters:
        density - The density to check.
        Returns:

            result == (density >= 1.42 * Math.pow(10, 12))

      • getMass

        @Basic
 @Raw
public double getMass()
        Return the mass of this ship.
        Specified by:
        getMass in class Entity

      • isValidMass

        public boolean isValidMass(double mass)
        Check whether the given mass is a valid mass for any ship.
        Parameters:
        mass - The mass to check.
        Returns:

            result == (mass >= 4/3 * Math.PI * Math.pow(this.getRadius(), 3) * this.getDensity() && mass < Double.MAX_VALUE)

      • setMass

        @Raw
public void setMass(double mass)
        Set the mass of this ship to the given mass.
        Parameters:
        mass - The new mass for this ship.
        Postcondition:
        If the given mass is a valid mass for any ship, the mass of this new ship is equal to the given mass.
            if (isValidMass(mass))
              then new.getMass() == mass

      • thrust

        public void thrust(double dt)
        Change the velocity of this ship based on the velocity, the orientation, the acceleration and the given time.
        Parameters:
        dt - The given time.
        Postcondition:
        The new velocity of the ship is derived by adding the acceleration times the cosinus or sinus of the current orientation times the time to the old velocity respectively.
             new.getVelocity().getXComponent()
             == this.getVelocity().getXComponent() + (this.getAcceleration() * Math.cos(this.getOrientation()))
             new.getVelocity().getYComponent()
             == this.getVelocity().getYComponent() + (this.getAcceleration() * Math.sin(this.getOrientation()))

      • getThrusterState

        public boolean getThrusterState()

      • thrustOn

        public void thrustOn()
        Enable the thruster

      • thrustOff

        public void thrustOff()
        Disable the thruster

      • getAcceleration

        public double getAcceleration()
        Calculate the acceleration of this ship.
        Returns:
        The force of the thruster divided by the mass of this ship, if the thruster is enabled.
        Returns:
        0 if the thruster is disabled.

        Specified by:
